metadata.description: Whether you're traipsing 'cross the glaciers of Hyperborea or merely facing the frigid facts of a snowy season at home, our daring damsels will warm your body and soul!  Be they in leather or fur or padded brass fittings (and oh, how they fit), they'll make your steampunk steamier than ever before!
metadata.name: Victorian Secret: Girls of Steampunk - Winter Fun Special!
